product_name: GoPro HERO3+ Black Edition Helmet Camera Bundle
long_description: Capture and share your fun with the GoPro HERO3+ Black Edition Helmet Camera Bundle. Smaller and lighter than its predecessor, the HERO3+ delivers improved image quality, versatility and convenience. Includes: HERO3+; jaws clamp and optional neck; tripod mount; quick-release tripod mount; handlebar seatpost pole mount; Wi-Fi remote; extra rechargeable 1180mAh battery. Wearable, mountable camera lets you capture immersive footage of your activities with professional-quality HD video up to 4K and 12MP photos at up to 30 frames per second. GoPro HERO3+ Black Edition features 30% longer battery life, 4 times faster Wi-Fi, a sharper lens and compatibility with all GoPro mounts and accessories. New SuperView(TM) video mode captures immersive wide-angle perspective. Auto Low Light mode intelligently adjusts frame rate for stunning low-light performance. Advanced capture settings include Looping Video, Continuous Photo, White Balance and Protune mode. Built-in Wi-Fi supports Wi-Fi Remote, plus content preview, playback and sharing via the GoPro App. Smaller, lighter housing is waterproof to 131 ft. (40m). Compatible with LCD Touch BacPac(TM) and Battery BacPac(TM) (sold separately). Compatible with all GoPro mounts for attaching to your body, gear, vehicles and more.
